segments.text: I'm shocked by how unaware the woman is about the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet, I can't believe she hasn't noticed them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for the cookie jar, and the stool he's standing on is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the girl isn't helping him, she's just standing there waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is, she must have no idea what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really surprised by how much is happening right under the woman's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice anything before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just full of surprises, I can't believe my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
